adding.name: splice
adding.desc: Adds and/or removes elements from an array.

adding.name: unshift
adding.shortDesc: add elements to the beginning of an array
adding.desc: Removes the first element from an array and returns that element.

adding.name: push
adding.shortDesc: add elements to the end of an array
adding.desc: Removes the first element from an array and returns that element.

adding.name: concat
adding.shortDesc: Add an array to another array
adding.desc: Returns a new array comprised of this array joined with other array(s) and/or value(s).
